mapper.select: select id, name, description, leaderId, locked, password, created_at from clan order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into code(name, description, leaderId, locked, password, created_at) values(#{name}, #{description}, #{leaderId}, #{locked}, #{password}, now())
mapper.update: update code set name=#{name}, description=#{description}, leaderId=#{leaderId}, locked=#{locked}, password=#{password} where id=#{id}
